name: Bonds (Ace Savaid)
description:
There is nothing stronger than a good bond.  Hopefully, that is enough to save my friend!

Made for the Brakeys Game Jam 2021.1 with the theme Stronger together.

 As one of the rare humans with powers, you must save your friend.  But you can't do it alone.  Travel the world, battling enemies and finding new members to add to your team.  Grow your strengths and get new items to aid in your quest to rescue a friend.  

Controls Keyboard 

Arrow keys -  Movement

Z - Select

X- Menu / Cancel

Mouse

Left click - move to point/select

Right click - Menu/ Cancel

Touchscreen

1 finger- move to point/select

2 finger tap - Menu/ Cancel 

(note for mobile players, the game may take longer to load)

Credits

Game  Engine and RTP Assets - RPG Maker MV
